projects.title: Modern Learning Platform
projects.description: Game-based learning system with micro-credential ecosystem and structured curriculum pipelines.
projects.longDescription: Built a comprehensive learning platform that combines game-based learning mechanics with a micro-credential ecosystem. Designed structured curriculum pipelines and tools for teachers and administrators. Implemented student operations and scheduling systems with automated allocation.

projects.title: Recipe Data Pipeline
projects.description: Next.js + Bun microservice that ingests recipes, normalizes data, and syncs to Notion.
projects.longDescription: Built a Next.js + Bun microservice that ingests recipes from multiple sources, normalizes the data structure, and syncs it to Notion. Implemented automated data ingestion pipeline with JSON schema generation and background worker jobs.

projects.title: Automated Allocation System
projects.description: Google Sheets Apps Script system for automated student and resource allocation.
projects.longDescription: Created an automated allocation system using Google Apps Script integrated with Google Sheets. Handles complex student and resource allocation logic with background processing and data validation.
